text: Nice lake but outside of Singapore. Beautiful landscape and also animals

Bukit Gumbak Hill is a hidden gem for nature lovers and hiking enthusiasts! There are several public toilet and rest points with benches, and the entire area is clean and well-maintained. I also appreciated the informative signboards about the local wildlife and plant species.

Whether you're looking for a peaceful escape from the city or a spot to enjoy nature's beauty, Bukit Gumbak Hill is a fantastic choice. Don't forget to bring plenty of water and wear comfortable shoes. Highly recommend a visit!
Great place to explore. Very serene and natural. Hope the land is not taken for any future developments.

Nature preserve between Goodview Gardens Gombak Rise Hillview Mansion and Pavillion Park. Breezy greenery away from busy cityscapes including Pavillion Children's playground and Seng Chew Quarry. Walking distance to Bukit Batok MRT bus interchange Bukit Batok Town Park "Little Guilin" Bukit Gombak ActiveSG Stadium Hong Kah North Community Club Bukit Gombak Neighbourhood Centre Shopping Mall with plenty of dinning shopping banking Prime and Giant supermarkets PAP Community Foundation Hong Kah and amenities nearby. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students expats locals visitors and families.
Second highest in SG after Bukit Timah Hill. Access to the top via Seng Chew Quarry into Bukit Gombak Trail. This hill is along the same ridge as Bukit Panjang Hill.
